Testimonial

How has the community experience been for you?

I'm always looking for ways to improve the community and get feedback on the experience here. What has been valuable to you, being a member of the community?

Also, I would love to be able to feature you and your work to help you out. If you have a few minutes, it would mean a great deal to me to hear about your experience!

*required in case I need to follow up. Your email will never be shared.

*optional in order to give credit and help give a shouout to your work (:

*Did you have any initial hesitations? How has that changed by being here?

What has been the most valuable to you in the community so far?

Permission

*Do you grant permission for Compass of Design to use any or all of your feedback in publicly displayed testimonials, marketing, and/or promotion?




Let's Get in Contact

What kind of project would you like to work on?

(Yes, you can select more than one.)


We are a company that focuses on helping your company reach it's goals through visual design. When starting a project with us, in order for us to get the conversation started while focusing on delivering value to you and your company, we have a few questions to get started.

What is a good phone number to reach you at?

How did you hear about So Magnetic?

What is the name of your business or the company you work for?

This needs to be case sensitive, and exactly as you need to have it designed.

What does your organization do and what excites you most about it?

How do people find out about your organization?

How does what you do differ from your competition?

How many people are in your organization?

Who is the audience you are trying to reach?

What attributes does your organization value?

What brands do you admire in your industry?

Is there a special event or launch date that is going to drive the deadline of this project?

What does the success from this project look like to you?

How would this project impact your business should it fail?

Have you worked with a design agency in the past (this project or any before)?

Why do you want to work with So Magnetic specifically?

Is there any additional information that needs to be taken into consideration?How's it going? :D





Thank you! This filled form here will help me keep your organization's goals and audience in the forefront of the design.
